projects.title: Logic Driven, Quality Built
projects.subtitle: Focusing on high-quality frontend implementation and API integration, with experience in backend development and cross-stack collaboration to ensure superior code maintainability.

1.title: Self-introduction
1.desc: Hello, I am Guan-Ru Wu. I graduated from the Department of Aquaculture at National Taiwan Ocean University, where I also earned my Master's degree. I am adept at communication, passionate about learning, and highly organized. When facing challenges, I apply rational thinking to solve problems and elevate projects to a higher standard. In my previous professional experiences, I consistently analyzed data to formulate strategies, ensuring efficient and stable execution. These attributes serve as a significant advantage in my transition to becoming a Front-End Engineer.
